text: Josef Bertalan (born 29 September 1934) is an Austrian former footballer. ==Career== Bertalan started his career with his local club ATSV Fischamend where he played in the first team when he was only 17 years old. In 1952, he went to SK Rapid Wien. From 1952 till 1963, he played for this club. He ended his career at 1. Simmeringer SC. On 1 May 1960, he played his only match for the Austrian national football team versus Czechoslowakia.Profile Josef Bertalan weltfu√üball.at ==Honours== *Austrian champion: 1956, 1957, 1960 *Austrian Cup: 1961 *European Champions Cup Semifinals: 1961 ==Other websites== *Ballesterer.at: Interview with Josef Bertalan (German) ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Austrian footballers Category:SK Rapid Wien players Category:Austrian football forwards Category:Austrian football champions
title: Josef Bertalan
